climbed."},{"lineNumber":96256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よいせっと。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heave-ho."},{"lineNumber":96257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっ、イタズラっ子は回収出来たっすよ〜、","translatedEnglishLine":"  Well then, I've retrieved the little troublemaker~,"},{"lineNumber":96258,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お姫さま」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Princess.\""},{"lineNumber":96259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとうございました、オルオレさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you very much, Olore-san.\""},{"lineNumber":96260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い〜ひっひっ、これくらい","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hee hee hee, this much is"},{"lineNumber":96261,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お安い御用ってなもんで」","translatedEnglishLine":"  just a simple favor.\""},{"lineNumber":96262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それにしても、本当にすごい身のこなしでした」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even so, your movements were truly incredible.\""},{"lineNumber":96263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、さすが猿顔。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, as expected from someone with a monkey face."},{"lineNumber":96264,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大したもんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Impressive.\""},{"lineNumber":96265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それ、褒めてます？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that supposed to be a compliment?\""},{"lineNumber":96266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや〜、でもあっしも年甲斐もなく","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nah, but I too, despite my age,"},{"lineNumber":96267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昔のこと思い出したっすね〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"  remembered the old days.\""},{"lineNumber":96268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昔？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The old days?\""},{"lineNumber":96269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いやいや、なんでも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no no, it's nothing...\""},{"lineNumber":96270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂も昔のことを思い出しましたぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I too recalled the old days...\""},{"lineNumber":96271,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その羽のように軽い身のこなし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That feather-like light movement..."},{"lineNumber":96272,"originalJapaneseLine":"　軽い口調に、特徴的ないひひ笑い……」","translatedEnglishLine":"  the light tone, and that distinctive 'ihihi' laugh...\""},{"lineNumber":96273,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昔、織田家にも忍び込んできた――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Long ago, you even snuck into the Oda household—\""},{"lineNumber":96274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「天下の大泥棒！　ニッケイ三世！×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The world's greatest thief! Nikkei the Third! ×3\""},{"lineNumber":96275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げげげっ……！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-gegege...!?\""},{"lineNumber":96276,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、あっしのこと知ってるんで！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"  You know who I am!?\""},{"lineNumber":96277,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここで会ったが百年目！×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Meeting you here is like seeing you after a hundred years! ×3\""},{"lineNumber":96278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":96279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ〜ばよっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"See ya!\""},{"lineNumber":96280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、逃げた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, he ran away.\""},{"lineNumber":96281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、曲者！　曲者じゃ〜っ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, impostor! Impostor!\""},{"lineNumber":96282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆の者、であえであえ〜っ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Everyone, get him! Get him!\""},{"lineNumber":96283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何やっとんだ、あの猿顔……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is that monkey face doing...\""},{"lineNumber":96284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人に歴史ありですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone has a history, after all...\""},{"lineNumber":96285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おほ〜っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh ho~...\""},{"lineNumber":96286,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の廊下を歩きながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Walking down the hallway of Rance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":96287,"originalJapaneseLine":"オルオレが情けない声を上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Olore let out a pitiful voice."},{"lineNumber":96288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんまキョロキョロすんじゃねーよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't look around so much."},{"lineNumber":96289,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺まで変な目で見られるだろうが」","translatedEnglishLine":"  They'll give me strange looks too.\""},{"lineNumber":96290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや〜、そんなこと言ったって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, even if you say that,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「足を踏み外しゃしないか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm so worried you might slip and fall,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもう不安で不安で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm just so anxious and anxious..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「目が離せなくなっとるわけです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just can't take my eyes off you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっふっふっ、そういうことなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh heh, if that's the case,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このオルオレ・ザ・サードにお任せあれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leave it to me, Olore the Third."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言うが早いか、オルオレは跳躍し枝に手をかけると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No sooner said than done, Olore jumped and grabbed a branch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: するりするりと流れるように木の上まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and climbed smoothly and fluidly up the tree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛び上がっていった。
「わあっ、すごいすごい」
「まるで猿だなありゃ」
「さあさあ、もう心配はいらねぇぜ〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, now, there's no need to worry anymore~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見ているだけでうっとりするような手際の良さで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a skill so captivating just to watch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オルオレはにゃんにゃんを回収すると、
登ったときと同じ速度で降りてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and descended at the same speed he had climbed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よいせっと。
さっ、イタズラっ子は回収出来たっすよ〜、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, I've retrieved the little troublemaker~,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お姫さま」
「ありがとうございました、オルオレさん」
「い〜ひっひっ、これくらい
お安い御用ってなもんで」
「それにしても、本当にすごい身のこなしでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even so, your movements were truly incredible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、さすが猿顔。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, as expected from someone with a monkey face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大したもんだ」
「それ、褒めてます？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that supposed to be a compliment?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや〜、でもあっしも年甲斐もなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nah, but I too, despite my age,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔のこと思い出したっすね〜」
「あ、いやいや、なんでも……」
「儂も昔のことを思い出しましたぞ……」
「その羽のように軽い身のこなし……
軽い口調に、特徴的ないひひ笑い……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the light tone, and that distinctive 'ihihi' laugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔、織田家にも忍び込んできた――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Long ago, you even snuck into the Oda household—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「天下の大泥棒！　ニッケイ三世！×３」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The world's greatest thief! Nikkei the Third! ×3"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げげげっ……！？
あ、あっしのこと知ってるんで！？」
「ここで会ったが百年目！×３」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Meeting you here is like seeing you after a hundred years! ×3"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜ばよっ！」
「あ、逃げた」
「ええい、曲者！　曲者じゃ〜っ！
皆の者、であえであえ〜っ！」
「何やっとんだ、あの猿顔……」
「人に歴史ありですね……」
ランス城の廊下を歩きながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Walking down the hallway of Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オルオレが情けない声を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Olore let out a pitiful voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんまキョロキョロすんじゃねーよ。
俺まで変な目で見られるだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They'll give me strange looks too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや〜、そんなこと言ったって、

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
